毛.definition: hair; feather; down; wool; mildew; mold; coarse or semifinished; young; raw; careless; unthinking; nervous; scared; (of currency) to devalue or depreciate; classifier for Chinese fractional monetary unit ( = 角[jiao3] , = one-tenth of a yuan or 10 fen 分[fen1])

毛主席.definition: Chairman Mao; Mao Zedong 毛澤東|毛泽东 (1893-1976), Chinese Communist leader

毛主席語錄.definition: Quotations from Chairman Mao Tse-tung, published from 1964 to about 1976

毛利人.definition: Maori, indigenous Polynesian people of New Zealand

毛口.definition: metal filings (e.g. from a drill or lathe); burr

毛塑像.definition: statue of Chairman Mao Zedong (1893-1976) 毛澤東|毛泽东[Mao2 Ze2 dong1]

毛姆.definition: Maugham (family name); W. Somerset Maugham (1874-1965), English writer

毛子.definition: hairy fellow; foreigner; Russian (derog.); bandit (old); tuft of fine hair

毛孩子.definition: child; kid; (slang) furry pet (such as a dog or cat)

毛廁.definition: variant of 茅廁|茅厕[mao2 si5]

毛手毛腳.definition: carelessly and haphazardly; to paw; to grope; to get fresh

毛根.definition: a strand of hair; pipe cleaner

毛概.definition: Introduction to Maoism (subject); abbr. for 毛澤東思想概論|毛泽东思想概论[Mao2 Ze2 dong1 Si1 xiang3 Gai4 lun4]

毛毛.definition: (pet name for a baby or small child)

毛毛雨.definition: drizzle; light rain; (fig.) mere trifle; sth that has only a weak effect

毛洋槐.definition: rose acacia (Robinia hispida, a false acacia)

毛澤東.definition: Mao Zedong (1893-1976), leader of the Chinese Communist Party 1935-1976

毛澤東：鮮為人知的故事.pinyin: máo zé dōng ： xiān wèi rén zhī de gù shì
毛澤東：鮮為人知的故事.definition: Mao: The Unknown Story by Jung Chang 張戎|张戎[Zhang1 Rong2] and Jon Halliday

毛片.definition: pornographic film; rushes (of a movie); (old) fur color

毛病.definition: fault; defect; shortcomings; ailment; CL:個|个[ge4]

毛窩.definition: cotton-padded shoes; (old) shoes made of woven grass, padded with feathers

毛竹.definition: moso bamboo (Phyllostachys edulis), used as timber etc

毛腳漁鴞.definition: (bird species of China) Blakiston's fish owl (Bubo blakistoni)

毛腿夜鷹.definition: (bird species of China) great eared nightjar (Lyncornis macrotis)

毛腿沙雞.definition: (bird species of China) Pallas's sandgrouse (Syrrhaptes paradoxus)

毛腿鵟.definition: (bird species of China) rough-legged buzzard (Buteo lagopus)

毛色.definition: (of an animal) appearance or color of coat

毛茶.definition: unprocessed sun-dried tea leaves used to make black or green tea

毛血旺.definition: duck's blood and beef tripe in spicy soup

毛豆.definition: immature green soy beans, either still in the pod (edamame) or removed from the pod

毛遂.definition: Mao Sui (third century BC), who proverbially offered his services to the King of Chu 楚, see 毛遂自薦|毛遂自荐[Mao2 Sui4 zi4 jian4]

毛遂自薦.definition: Mao Sui recommends himself (idiom); to offer one's services (in the style of Mao Sui offering his services to king of Chu 楚 of the Warring states)

毛選.definition: Selected Works of Mao Zedong (abbr. for 毛澤東選集|毛泽东选集[Mao2 Ze2dong1 Xuan3ji2])

毛邊.definition: (textiles, papermaking etc) raw edge; rough edge

毛邊紙.definition: fine paper made from bamboo, used for calligraphy, painting etc; also written 毛邊|毛边[mao2 bian1]

毛鄧三.definition: Mao Zedong Thought, Deng Xiaoping Theory & the Three Represents (abbr. for 毛澤東思想|毛泽东思想[Mao2 Ze2 dong1 Si1 xiang3] + 鄧小平理論|邓小平理论[Deng4 Xiao3 ping2 Li3 lun4] + 三個代表|三个代表[San1 ge4 Dai4 biao3])

毛錐.definition: writing brush (old); Castanopsis fordii, a species of evergreen tree common in the south of China whose calybia (nuts) resemble the tip of a writing brush

毛骨悚然.definition: to have one's hair stand on end (idiom); to feel one's blood run cold

毛鴨蛋.definition: balut (boiled duck egg with a partly-developed embryo, which is eaten from the shell)
